Name: Root 56
Instructions: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and gently STIR.
Review: I've used more of the liqueur than suggested by the folk at Jägermeister as I feel the drink benefits from more of the liqueur's herbal rootiness which softens the ginger beer's spice.
History: Adapted from a drink promoted by Jägermeister and inspired by ginger root, one of the 56 herbs and spices that flavour Jägermeister.
Nutrition: One serving of Root 56 contains 197 calories
